price: (بيا به) وويل شي: د جهنم دروازو ته ننوځئ، تل به پكې اوسئ نو (دا) د كبرجنو ناكاره هستوګنځى دى.
arabic: قِيلَ ٱدۡخُلُوٓاْ أَبۡوَٰبَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۖ فَبِئۡسَ مَثۡوَى ٱلۡمُتَكَبِّرِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: qīla ud'khulū abwāba jahannama khālidīna fīhā fabi'sa mathwā al-mutakabirīna
